## Quantifying Genetic Variation in Reproductive Traits in Scots Pine 

## Metadata

# R_Code.R 
    Full R script for data analysis and producing figures
    
# cone_data.xlsx
    Full data set of reproductive traits in excel format
    
# cone_data.csv
    Full data set of reproductive traits in csv format 
    
# Preliminary_Traits.csv
    Preliminary trait measurements in populations ΒΕ,ΒW, GT
    
# Cone_corr.csv
    data set for correlations across all populations 
    
# seed_corr
    data set for seed correlations across all populations
    
# gen_corr
    calculated genetic correlations between traits 
    
# phen_corr
    calculated phenotypic correlations between traits
